details.description: A page providing further information about the DaPaaS questionnaire and discovery workshops.
details.excerpt: In recent years the data landscape has grown and expanded at an amazing speed. Data forms the basis of numerous innovations, projects and causes. It also provides new opportunities for entrepreneurship on a remarkable scale.
details.content:
In recent years the data landscape has grown and expanded at an amazing speed. Data forms the basis of numerous innovations, projects and causes. It also provides new opportunities for entrepreneurship on a remarkable scale.

The DaPaaS project is committed to understanding the ways in which individuals consume and publish data; in doing so, we hope to provide innovative tools and solutions to promote the publication and reuse of open data.

What do you think?

We need your feedback. You could:

  • take 5 minutes and answer our questionnaire;
  • tell us which discussion points about data use weâ€™ve missed;
  • register your interest (by emailing below) to participate in free data publishing tools workshops (UK only)

Please email amanda@theodi.org or tweet us at @dapaasproject to participate further!
